Package org.neo4j.kernel.internal

Interface GraphDatabaseAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphDatabaseService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DbmsRule, EmbeddedDbmsRule, GraphDatabaseFacade, ImpermanentDbmsRule, TestFabricGraphDatabaseService
    public interface GraphDatabaseAPI
extends GraphDatabaseService
    This API can be used to get access to services.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getDependencyResolver

        DependencyResolver getDependencyResolver()
        Look up database components for direct access. Usage of this method is generally an indication of architectural error.

                                     LoginContext loginContext,
                                     ClientConnectionInfo clientInfo,
                                     long timeout,
                                     TimeUnit unit)

        Parameters:

        loginContext - transaction login context
        clientInfo - transaction client info
        timeout - transaction timeout
        unit - time unit of timeout argument
